title: Le Pain Quotidien - Spuistraat
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International restaurant chain featuring artisan bakery and communal table seating. Menu includes several ovo-lacto vegetarian dishes as well as vegan ones (denote by carrot sign). Specialty is tartines, open sandwiches with toppings. Has Wi-Fi. Located on the edge of the trendy "9 streets" area of Amsterdam's old town.
